definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the process of carefully picking or choosing a specific item, option, or individual from a larger set or group. It is often used in the context of decision-making, where one carefully evaluates various alternatives before making a selection.

examples.german: Ich habe eine große Auswahl an Büchern.
examples.english: I have a wide selection of books.

examples.german: Die Auswahl der Gewinner wird bald bekannt gegeben.
examples.english: The selection of the winners will be announced soon.
